metadata.title: CVE-2020-7237 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Cacti 1.2.8 allows Remote Code Execution (by privileged users) via shell metacharacters in the Performance Boost Debug Log field of poller_automation.php. OS commands are executed when a new poller cycle begins. The attacker must be authenticated, and must have access to modify the Performance Settings of the product.

criterions.comment: cacti package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.2.9+ds1-1ubuntu1').
